videoData.title: Why machines must make us better humans
videoData.socialTitle: Why machines must make us better humans

nodes.whoTheyAre: Ever since he was a kid, Steve Brown has been fascinated with the future and what technology can do for people. Brown rolls together technological, demographic, ethnographic, economic and other trends to build a compelling picture of the future, engaging others in a conversation on what types of future experiences we want to build together in the next decade and beyond.

videoData.description: We are rapidly moving towards a world where computers have the ability to not only process tons of information, but to gather it by seeing and hearing. Steve Brown takes a peek into the future to explore how these advances will impact our lives.
videoData.socialDescription: We are rapidly moving towards a world where computers have the ability to not only process tons of information, but to gather it by seeing and hearing. Steve Brown takes a peek into the future to explore how these advances will impact our lives.
